content: te puna aio is my very first published pattern it is a textured square designed for the friends around the world 3 crochet-along aka the fat3 cal yarn weight 10ply/aran hook 5mm/h measurement 30cm/12 feel free to use a different weight yarn with its recommended hook the only thing that will change is it s measurement a video tutorial for this square has been made thank you sooooo much bonnie bay you rock a link to her vid can be found here please note the video will not be available till friday 28th december 11am est https //www youtube com/watch v=4awsjsnwyhg&feature=youtu be&fbclid=iwar0x0ehg4h7qcan9ux_zvfdytwrlwsebposrkj140hy2xnqwqkrjkg8-unk ***important - extra rounds for fat3 participants*** these rounds are to bring the final stitch count of this square to 48 to prepare for joining round 1 - join in any corner chsp ch1 * 2sc ch2 2sc in corner chsp single_crochet in next 38sts* 4 times 42sts ch2 per side round 2 - join in any corner chsp ch1 * single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in corner chsp single_crochet in next 42sts* 4 times 44sts ch2 per side round 3 - join in any corner chsp ch1 * 2sc ch2 2sc in corner chsp single_crochet in next 44sts* 4 times 48sts ch2 per side check out the blog below for all you need to know about the fat3 cal https //calcrochetalong com/friends-around-the-world-cals/ enjoy arohanui patrina
